pen|(n)|bút mực|Ví dụ:|I forgot my pen at home.
pencil|(n)|bút chì|Ví dụ:|You'd better sharpen your pencil.
paper|(n)|giấy|Ví dụ:|She wrote her name and address on a sheet of paper.
eraser|(n)|Cục tẩy, cục gôm|Ví dụ:|I buy a pencil and an eraser.
pencil sharpener|(n)|đồ gọt bút chì|Ví dụ:|I've lost my pencil sharpener.
book|(n)|sách|Ví dụ:|Have you read any good book recently?
pack|(n)|túi đeo, ba lô|Ví dụ:|We passed a group of walkers, carrying huge packs.
crayon|(n)|bút màu sáp|Ví dụ:|He had some crayons.
scissors|(n)|cái kéo|Ví dụ:|Could you pass me the scissors, please?
glue|(n)|keo dán|Ví dụ:|He sticks to her like glue.
calculator|(n)|máy tính|Ví dụ:|My brother needs to buy a pocket calculator to take the exam.
compass|(n)|com-pa|Ví dụ:|I use the compass to draw circle.
bag|(n)|cái túi|Ví dụ:|I left my bag at the shop.
ruler|(n)|cây thước|Ví dụ:|This is my brother's ruler.
board|(n)|bảng|Ví dụ:|The exam results went up on the board.
chalk|(n)|phấn|Ví dụ:|He picked up a piece of chalk and wrote the answer on the blackboard.
dictionary|(n)|từ điển|Ví dụ:|To check how a word is spelled, look it up in a dictionary.
watercolour|(n)|màu nước|Ví dụ:|Most of her paintings were done in watercolours.
globe|(n)|quả địa cầu|Ví dụ:|She used this globe to teach.
protractor|(n)|thước đo góc|Ví dụ:|You must prepare protractor and compass before you start.
stapler|(n)|dụng cụ kim bấm|Ví dụ:|This stapler is broken.
paintbrush|(n)|cọ quét sơn|Ví dụ:|He has bought a new paintbrush.
paper clip|(n)|kẹp giấy|Ví dụ:|I need two more paper clips.
